item.description: This is an additional event to the monthly Group, being offered this month by Andrea. All levels welcome. Must RSVP by March 25th so I can make a reservation at the restaurant. I've heard great things about this restaurant which is located in Blackstone Plaza, Millbury. Should be a good time. Vamos a hablar en espanol pero si eres principiante no hay problema! Puedes invitar a alguien (guests welcome). All levels welcome!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at the front of the restaurant at 6:55

group.name: The Worcester Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Evento Social para Practicar Espanol y Conocer mas a los miembros del Grupo!
